isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - INSTALL - INSTALL HEADLIGHT AND TURN SIGNAL LENS ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: INSTALL HEADLIGHT AND TURN SIGNAL LENS ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Install Headlight and Turn Signal Lens Assembly on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA), 9900 i (SFA) 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 54 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: If removed, or replacing the turn signal bulb (Item 6), install the turn signal bulb into the turn signal bulb socket (Item 5).
Install the turn signal bulb socket (Item 5) into the turn signal lens assembly (Item 4).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 55 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Hold the turn signal lens assembly (Item 4, Figure 54) in position at the headlight/turn signal assembly mounting bracket (Item 7, Figure 54). Insert the two guide pins (Item 1) on the turn signal lens assembly (Item 2) into the guide pin holes (Item 3) in the headlight/turn signal assembly mounting bracket.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 53 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Rotate the turn signal lens assembly (Item 1) toward the headlight/turn signal assembly mounting bracket (Item 3), making sure the two guide pins (Item 1, Figure 55) do not pop out of the guide pin holes (Item 3, Figure 55) of the headlight/turn signal assembly mounting bracket.

figure.caption: Figure 55. Positioning Turn Signal Lens Assembly Guide Pins on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA), 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA)

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 52 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the turn signal lens assembly (Item 2) in place and install two mounting screws (Item 1), located in the upper and lower corners of the turn signal lens assembly and tighten.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 51 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the headlight bezel (Item 2) over the headlight/turn signal assembly (Item 3) and install four mounting screws (Item 1) securing the headlight bezel to the headlight/turn signal assembly and tighten.
Repeat this procedure for the other turn signal lens assembly.
